discord.hint: You need to login and join our <1>Discord server</1> in order to receive notification on Discord

statusBar.title: Status Bar
statusBar.hint: Show status bar at bottom of the page

retry.title: Retry
retry.hint: Below are actions which can be performed if xpath is not found by extension after retry

configSettings.title: Config Settings
configSettings.autoHint: Auto (default) once browser is refreshed or new page is loaded extension auto loads with it
configSettings.manualHint: Manual once browser is loaded, user can manually invoke extension using hotkey
configSettings.windowHint: Window (default) browser loads extension once all its content is loaded
configSettings.documentHint: Document browser loads extension before scripts and images are loaded (faster)(unsafe)
configSettings.triggerUrlChangeHint: Trigger URL Change will trigger configuration if URL is changed without page reload (like in SPA)

reorder.title: Reorder Configurations
reorder.hint: Please save all configurations before reordering

extensionNotFound.title: Extension Not Found
extensionNotFound.subTitle: This is configuration page for Auto Clicker - AutoFill {{VITE_PUBLIC_VARIANT}} extension
extensionNotFound.hint: You need to download extension first in order to make use of this

actionSettings.title: Action Settings
actionSettings.info: Action settings will override global settings, and it's applicable for both action and its addon condition
actionSettings.iframeFirstHint: This checks element within iframe first and then on main page

retry.title: Retry
retry.hint: * Below are actions which can be performed if xpath is not found by extension after retry

actionCondition.title: Action Condition
actionCondition.info: Action condition are used to add condition with relates to previous action status
actionCondition.hint: Below are actions which can be performed if condition is not matched by extension

ads.title: Please allow ads on our site
ads.subTitle: Which of these extensions do you have?

addon.title: Addon
addon.info: Addon condition will be checked before executing Action

recheck.title: Recheck
recheck.hint: * Below are actions which can be performed if recheck is not matched by extension after recheck

schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.info: Schedule configuration for specific date and time

configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.name: Name
configuration.noConfig: No Configuration Found, Please refine your search.

batch.title: Batch
batch.repeatHint: Repeat will re run all actions without reloading page with the interval given.
batch.refreshHint: Refresh will reload the page once all actions are completed.

error.scheduleDate: Schedule date should match YYYY-MM-DD (2025-12-01) format
error.scheduleTime: Schedule time should match HH:mm:ss.sss (23:59:59.000) format
error.scheduleRepeat: Schedule repeat should be number only
error.startTime: Start time should match HH:mm:ss:fff (12:12:12:000) format
error.hotKey: Single letter without Ctrl/Command is not valid

startTime.content:
Try <1>Schedule URL our new browser extension.
it's used to schedule webpage / URL at particular day and time

hotkey.title: Hotkey
hotkey.content: Press hotkey on keyboard to auto type in field
hotkey.hint: Single letter without <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>, <kbd>Alt</kbd> or <kbd>Shift</kbd> is not valid

home.title: Welcome to Auto Clicker – AutoFill
home.subtitle: Automate clicks and form fills on any website by defining targets and actions.

step1.title: 1. Install the Extension
step1.desc: Download and install the extension from the Chrome Web Store or Edge Add-ons.

step2.title: 2. Configure a Target Page
step2.desc: Open a web page, right-click any element and choose Auto Clicker – AutoFill → Configure for this Field.

step3.title: 3. Save & Run
step3.desc: Save your configuration and reload the target page. The automation runs automatically.

tip1.title: Try on the Test Page
tip1.desc: Open test.getautoclicker.com, add two actions — one to fill a username field and one to click a button — then save and run.

tip2.title: Use XPath Element Finders
tip2.desc: Target elements precisely using XPath expressions like //input[@name="username"] instead of CSS selectors.

tip3.title: Handle Slow Page Loads
tip3.desc: Set an Init Wait on your configuration if the page loads slowly before your actions run.

tip4.title: Global Settings & Hotkeys
tip4.desc: Configure start mode, define a keyboard shortcut, and adjust the status bar position in Global Settings.

tip5.title: Right-click to Auto-Capture
tip5.desc: Right-click any input or button on a page and select Configure for this Field to auto-fill the URL and Element Finder.

video1.title: Getting Started with Auto Clicker AutoFill
